body.aboutMeDescription:
Hello, I am Anna Saadat,
a final-year student in Electrical Engineering (Digital Systems) at Science and Research University.
My interests focus on artificial intelligence, machine learning, and deep learning, which I am currently exploring through a research project in AI.
I have also worked on the capacity optimization of a multi-story parking system, gaining valuable experience in applying theory to real-world challenges.
I am a motivated learner, committed to research, innovation, and continuous growth.
